scripts.test_package: npm run install-package && python -m pytest --junitxml=../../../../test_reports/test_metadata_extractor.xml test
scripts.create-ecr: aws ecr describe-repositories --repository-names mdx --profile $AWS_PROFILE --region ${AWS_REGION} || aws ecr create-repository --repository-name mdx --profile $AWS_PROFILE --region ${AWS_REGION}
scripts.push-docker: npm run create-ecr; npm run login-ecr; docker push ${AWS_ACCOUNT_ID}.dkr.ecr.${AWS_REGION}.amazonaws.com/mdx
scripts.build-push-docker: npm run build-docker && npm run push-docker
